name: Birb, The Getaway
description:
Birb, The Getaway is an action platformer. This game has been made in the GameDev Insider Gamejam that had for theme, If you stop you die. As a result the following mechanics has been created :  a restriction in time before your next kill. And the entirety of the game is based around, have fun and try it out.

Creator :

Programmer :

Benjamin Brunet (CarryBoo)
